titleStmt.title: A plea for peace: or A sermon preached in St. Pauls Church in London. Iuly 9. 1637. By Henry Vertue, parson of the parish church of Alhollowes Honey-Lane in London
titleStmt.author: Vertue, Henry, d. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. F[lesher] for Iohn Clark neare S. Peters Church in Cornhill,
